text: Tem iz vashikh zhen, kotoryye khotya sami ne zhdut ochishcheniy, no dlya vas yeshche somnitel'ny, - tem srok - tri mesyatsa, kak i tem u kotorykh yeshche ne bylo ochishcheniy. A beremennym srok, kogda oni razreshatsya ot svoyego bremeni. Kto boitsya Boga, On tomu v yego dele dast oblegcheniye
